name: Dictionary
description: Store data under named keys, e.g. set "key" to "value".

conditions.name: Compare value
conditions.description: Compare the value at a key.

params.name: Key
params.description: The name of the key to test.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the key's value.

conditions.name: Has key
conditions.description: Check if a key name has been stored.

params.name: Key
params.description: The name of the key to check if exists.

conditions.name: Is empty
conditions.description: True if no keys are in storage.

conditions.name: For each key
conditions.description: Repeat the event for each key/value pair that has been stored.

conditions.name: Compare current value
conditions.description: Compare the value at the current key in the for-each loop.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the value of the current key in the for-each loop.

actions.name: Add key
actions.description: Add a new key in to storage. If it already exists, its value will be overwritten.

params.name: Key
params.description: The name of the key.  If it already exists, its value will be overwritten.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to store for the key.

actions.name: Set key
actions.description: Set an existing key in to storage. If it does not exist, this will have no effect.

params.name: Key
params.description: The name of the key.  If it does not exist, this will have no effect.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to store for the key.

params.name: Key
params.description: The name of the key to delete.

actions.name: Clear
actions.description: Delete all keys and values from storage, returning to empty.

actions.name: Load
actions.description: Load from a dictionary previously encoded in JSON format.

params.name: JSON
params.description: A string of the JSON data to load.

actions.name: Download
actions.description: Download the contents of the dictionary as a JSON file.
actions.display_text: Download as JSON data with filename [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: Filename
params.description: The name of the file to download.

expressions.name: Get
expressions.description: Get the value from a key.  0 is returned if it does not exist.

params.name: Key
params.description: The name of the key to retrieve.

expressions.name: KeyCount
expressions.description: Get the number of keys in storage.

expressions.name: CurrentKey
expressions.description: Get the current key name in a for-each loop.

expressions.name: CurrentValue
expressions.description: Get the current key value in a for-each loop.

expressions.name: AsJSON
expressions.description: Return the contents of the dictionary in JSON format.

expressions.name: GetDefault
expressions.description: Get the value from a key, or return a custom value if it does not exist.

params.name: Key
params.description: The name of the key to retrieve.

params.name: Default
params.description: The value to return if the key does not exist.
